**No Ads. No Life Stories. Just Food.**

A single-file, bloat-free recipe extractor powered by Google Gemini. It takes messy URLs or text and converts them into clean, savable recipe cards.

## ğŸ¤– Transparency Note
**I did not write this code.** This entire application was generated by **Google Gemini** based on my specific prompts and architecture requirements. I designed the logic and features; the AI wrote the JavaScript and HTML.

## âš¡ Setup (Get your API Key)
This app is "Bring Your Own Key" (BYOK). You need a free Google Gemini API key to make it work.

1. Go to [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey).
2. Click **"Create API Key"**.
3. Copy the key (it starts with `AIza...` or similar).
4. Open **0FluffCook**, click the **Gear âš™ï¸**, and paste it.

## ğŸ›  Features
* **AI Extraction:** Cleans up messy websites instantly.
* **Local Storage:** Recipes are saved to your browser cache. Zero servers.
* **Favorites:** Pin your top meals.
* **Import/Export:** Backup your database to JSON.
* **Dark Mode:** OLED-friendly interface.
